data.message: I HAVE JUST BEEN INFORMED BY SOMEONE SAYING THAT THEY ARE MARK ZUXKERGBERG FACEBOOK CEO AND ADVISING ME THAT I HAVE JUST WON SIX HUNDRED THOUSAND DOLLARS. ALL INHAVE TO DO IS SEND HIS TEAM TWO HUNDRED AND FIFTY DOLLARS. JUST CURIOUS TO SEE HIW MANY PEOPLE WOULD DO THAT.

replies.message: Hi Rudolph. It sounds like you've received a spam message. Please report this message as spam by following these steps listed in our Help Center: http://bit.ly/2wkSaVU. -Brittany
